title: r/Prorevenge Grandma Tricks Greedy Preacher From Beyond The Grave!
description: r/Prorevenge In today's story, a pair of greedy preachers set their eyes on a sweet old lady's estate as she gets closer and closer to the end of her life. They completely ignore her for years, and show up only to demand that she puts the church to her will. After she passes and the lawyer reads the will, the grandma left a few surprises for the preachers that left them shocked and publicly humiliated! If you like this content, hit the follow button for more daily Reddit content!
dc:creator: rSlash Reads Reddit
